languages.text: "Именем династии Чорда, приказываю опустить оружие! Не отягчайте свой приговор сопротивлением!"

traits.locale_text: [Драфт] Именем Инцендии Чорды, приказываю вам опустить оружие. Сдайтесь и мы сохраним вам жизнь.

languages.text: "In the name of the Chorda dynasty, I order you to lower your weapons! Do not aggravate your sentence by resisting!"
languages.original_text: "Именем династии Чорда, приказываю опустить оружие! Не отягчайте свой приговор сопротивлением!"

traits.locale_text: "In the name of the Chorda dynasty, I order you to lower your weapons! Do not aggravate your sentence by resisting!"
"In the name of the Chorda dynasty, I order you to lower your weapons! Do not aggravate your sentence by resisting!"
"In the name of the Chorda dynasty, I order you to lower your weapons! Do not aggravate your sentence by resisting!"
"In the name of the Chorda dynasty, I order you to lower your weapons! Do not aggravate your sentence by resisting!"

languages.text: “以库尔达王朝的名义，我命令你们放下武器！停止反抗，否则你们会受到更重的惩罚！”
languages.original_text: "In the name of the Chorda dynasty, I order you to lower your weapons! Do not aggravate your sentence by resisting!"

traits.locale_text: “以库尔达王朝的名义，我命令你们放下武器！停止反抗，否则你们会受到更重的惩罚！”

languages.text: «¡En nombre de la dinastía Chorda, tiren las armas! ¡No agraven las circunstancias resistiéndose!».
languages.original_text: "In the name of the Chorda dynasty, I order you to lower your weapons! Do not aggravate your sentence by resisting!"

traits.locale_text: «¡En nombre de la dinastía Chorda, tiren las armas! ¡No agraven las circunstancias resistiéndose!».

languages.text: 「チョーダ王朝の名において、武器を下ろすよう命ずる！抵抗すれば刑が重くなるぞ！」
languages.original_text: "In the name of the Chorda dynasty, I order you to lower your weapons! Do not aggravate your sentence by resisting!"

traits.locale_text: 「チョーダ王朝の名において、武器を下ろすよう命ずる！抵抗すれば刑が重くなるぞ！」

languages.text: « Au nom de la dynastie Chorda, je vous ordonne de baisser vos armes ! N'aggravez pas votre cas, cessez de résister ! »
languages.original_text: "In the name of the Chorda dynasty, I order you to lower your weapons! Do not aggravate your sentence by resisting!"

traits.locale_text: « Au nom de la dynastie Chorda, je vous ordonne de baisser vos armes ! N'aggravez pas votre cas, cessez de résister ! »

languages.text: "Im Namen der Dynastie Chorda, ich befehle Euch, die Waffen zu senken! Verschlimmert die Strafe nicht, indem Ihr Euch wehrt!"
languages.original_text: "In the name of the Chorda dynasty, I order you to lower your weapons! Do not aggravate your sentence by resisting!"

traits.locale_text: "Im Namen der Dynastie Chorda, ich befehle Euch, die Waffen zu senken! Verschlimmert die Strafe nicht, indem Ihr Euch wehrt!"

languages.text: "Chorda hanedanlığı adına, silahlarınızı bırakmanızı emrediyorum! Direnerek cezanızı ağırlaştırmayın!"
languages.original_text: "In the name of the Chorda dynasty, I order you to lower your weapons! Do not aggravate your sentence by resisting!"
